member.name: T:Logger.Console.ConsoleLogger
member.summary: Logs output to standard output of console windows.

member.name: M:Logger.Console.ConsoleLogger.AcceptLogEntry(Microsoft.Localization.LocSolutions.Logger.LogLevel,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the text entry to console.

member.name: P:Logger.Console.ConsoleLogger.ShowSeverity
member.summary:
Set to true to prepend the message in the console with severity information.
If false, only the bare string entry will be output to console.
